storagePid: A typo3 pid where the image Datasets are stored.
cacheControl: Enable the Cache Control Feature to get a better performance, images will be loaded from browser cache

fileLinks: Chose which file links you desire, none, softLinks, hardLinks or ture copies. File links enables that images can be displayed with no need of DB-request as they really exist. A great deal for performance!
virtualPathRemove: Virtually remove this segment from the image path. (Notice, this will only work if you set .htaccess accordingly)
enable: switch the extension on or off
data: This is how the extension gets it's information to generate a cool image url. Examples are fal:title, fal:description, page:title
case: The image file name should be in upper or lower case?
trim: removes leading and ending white space
crop: Limits the maximum length of a image file name
spaceCharacter: Space character in the generated file name

hashLength: To keep the file names static, not depending on cache and order of image viewed - Important for SEO! This specifies the legth of the hash. The hash will get longer if necessary automatically
smartEncoding: gereates ASCII file-names
imageFolder: A folder where the images are supposed to be stored. Don't start the folder with a "/". The path is relativ to the TYPO3 main directory.
